long_description:
Normally, the only way to get your workout on a vacation or business trip would be heading to your hotel gym. While I am proud to say our gym is full of great amenities including free yoga mats for use, it can sometimes just not be enough.

 
The best workouts push you, get you outside, and try new things. Not to mention, traveling and keeping up with your workout routine truly go together. Whether, it’s your fitbit or fitness tracker reminding you to keep up with your goals. I take pride in the fact that our hotel goes above usual fitness standards for our guests.

 
We offer bike rentals, helmets, yoga mats, bike and running routes from the hotel. We also work closely with San Francisco’s Recreation and Park Department to provide you weekly FREE workout sessions throughout our parks. For example, this month you can join a variety of zumba and yoga classes that are extremely close to your hotel! If you want something a little more intense then check out our hiking blog article! This will share some of the best hikes in San Francisco.

 

Finally, don’t forget we offer Zipcar‘s right on site and electric car charging stations. If you do bring your car, be sure to ask for Parking Package. You can enjoy complimentary parking for one car with this special package.  You can also take advantage of other packages to save that include a bed and breakfast special, a California resident rate, and group promos! http://bit.ly/1PMe0Wb
